items.prompt: A professional headshot of a confident businesswoman, studio lighting

features.title: Multiple AI Models, Unique Styles
features.description: Each model has distinct strengths. Compare them all to find what works for your vision.

items.title: Flux Pro
items.description: Photorealistic with stunning detail. Best for product shots, portraits, and professional photography.

items.title: Flux Dev
items.description: Balanced quality and speed. Great for general-purpose generation and quick iterations.

items.title: Recraft
items.description: Design-focused with clean aesthetics. Perfect for illustrations and graphic design.

items.title: Ideogram
items.description: Excellent text rendering. Ideal for logos, posters, and designs with typography.

items.title: Gemini
items.description: Google's latest image model. Creative and versatile for unique artistic outputs.

how-it-works.title: How It Works
how-it-works.description: From idea to perfect image in 4 simple steps

steps.title: Enter Your Prompt
steps.description: Describe what you want to create

steps.title: Look & Compare
steps.description: See different interpretations side by side

steps.title: Make Your Choice
steps.description: Choose the style that matches your vision

steps.title: Iterate & Perfect
steps.description: Refine with the selected model until perfect

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Comparing all 5 models costs 15 credits. Single model iteration costs 2-4 credits. New users get 10 free credits to start - no credit card required.

items.question: Can I download the images?
items.answer: Yes! All images are 100% yours. No watermarks, full resolution, instant download. Use them anywhere - commercial use allowed.

items.question: What happens after I pick a direction?
items.answer: You enter iteration mode. Keep refining your image with the same model until it's exactly what you want. Each iteration costs only 2-4 credits.

items.question: Which AI model should I choose?
items.answer: That's what we help you discover! Each model has unique strengths - Flux Pro for photorealism, Recraft for illustrations, Ideogram for text/logos. Compare them all and pick what works best for your vision.

items.question: How fast is the generation?
items.answer: Most images are ready in under 30 seconds. You'll see all 5 model results appearing as they complete - no need to wait for all of them.

cta.title: Generate. Look. Make your choice.
cta.description: Join creators who stopped guessing and started comparing. Remember us at glmimage.net
